name: BD_domain
description: The domain within which the data product exists.

name: BD_displayName
description: The name of the data product in human readable format.

name: BD_name
description: The name of the data product.

name: BD_fullyQualifiedName
description: Fully Qualified Name (FQN) that uniquely identifies the data product.

name: BD_description
description: A brief description of the data product.

name: BD_version
description: The version number of the data product.

name: owner
description: The owner or responsible party for the data product.

name: owner_name
description: The name of the owner or responsible party for the data product.

name: dev_stage_name
description: The name of the development stage.

name: prod_stage_name
description: The name of the production stage.

name: input_port_name
description: The name of the input port.

name: input_port_display_name
description: The name of the input port in human readable format.

name: input_port_version
description: The version number of the data product port.

name: input_port_description
description: A brief description of the data product port.

name: system_name
description: The name of the system that the data product depends on.

name: output_port_name
description: The name of the output port.

name: output_port_version
description: The version number of the output port.

name: output_port_display_name
description: The display name of the output port in human readable format.

name: output_port_description
description: A brief description of the output port.
